"Despite my great respect for old Kutiizov," he continued, "we should be a nice set of fel- lows if we were to wait about and so give him a chance to escape, or to trick us, now that we certainly have him in our hands! No, we mustn't forget Suv6rov and his rule not to put yourself in a position to be attacked, but yourself to attack. Believe me in war the en- ergy of young men often shows the way better than all
